Author: God Dieux
Content:
Some of the companies you have recommended… have been tested and do not contain the contents claimed and in fact contain inferior materials and have large discrepancies of advertised contents, such as products from pure encapsulations!

Also, on one hand, you recommend not having baking soda, but then on your website, you have baking soda and an affiliate link to it. So does that mean you don’t want us to have baking soda or you don’t want us to have a certain type of baking soda.

Author: Cat Stell
Content: -God Dieux Baking soda can have external uses xx

Author: God Dieux
Content:
--Cat Stell that’s an excellent point

And why would he need it on his website unless it was for a specific type of baking soda that is healthier than others ?

And if so, is it for internal or external use?

Author: Doreen DiMaria
Content:
-God Dieux you have to make sure baking soda is aluminum free if you are going to ingest 
Some items are not for internal use like ACV 
 He really stands by vimergy supplements

Author: God Dieux
Content:
--Doreen DiMaria can you share a quote explaining this or a link to where he shares about this?

Because normally, if something is on his no food list, I just take it as I absolutely eliminate

But if he is fine with us using a healthier version of baking soda, I would like to understand so I can incorporate as needed

Author: Doreen DiMaria
Content: --God Dieux it won’t let me post on here just google medical medium and baking soda

Author: Doreen DiMaria
Content:
--God Dieux external use and maybe baking 
But if you’re trying to heal from chronic illness you won’t be eating baked goods anyway.

Author: God Dieux
Content:
--Doreen DiMaria where is that written?

You can do gluten-free food that is homemade 

I make gnocchi with cassava flour and occasionally I added a bit of baking soda so I’m trying to determine if there is a way to use baking soda that is appropriate or not

Author: Doreen DiMaria
Content: --God Dieux if you google medical medium and baking soda you’ll get some answers

Author: Denis Goodbee
Content: -God Dieux , his recommendation is not to take it internally but for use in baking is ok just use the aluminum free type.
